China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 1 月 24 日星期三 05:14:40 GMT 120
EU draws up economic security plans, with mind on ChinaThe European Commission will set out plans on Wednesday to bolster the European Union's economic security through closer scrutiny of foreign investment and tighter controls on exports and outflows of technologies to rivals such as China. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 05:04:12 GMT 5YNX6QJEHNN4JJNELCS467S32U https://www.reuters.com/markets/europe/eu-draws-up-economic-security-plans-with-mind-china-2024-01-24/Philip Blenkinsop可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Exclusive: Tesla plans to build new electric vehicles in mid-2025 -sourcesTesla has told suppliers it wants to start production of a new mass market electric vehicle codenamed "Redwood" in mid-2025, according to four people familiar with the matter, with two of them describing the model as a compact crossover. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 05:03:18 GMT WCXYMIVUN5LOPKLB7LHCFGNCT4 https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/tesla-plans-build-new-electric-vehicles-mid-2025-sources-2024-01-24/Hyunjoo Jin, Joseph White商业汽车与交通
Former Taiwan ally Nauru re-establishes diplomatic ties with ChinaChina and Nauru on Wednesday re-established diplomatic ties, Chinese state media reported, after the tiny Pacific island nation unexpectedly severed relations with its now former ally Taiwan. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 04:32:46 GMT QKBWUG56GZIMZBWUQGYS7WDDME https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-nauru-re-built-diplomatic-ties-state-media-2024-01-24/Reuters世界亚太地区
Country Garden seeks to sell assets worth $530 mln in GuangzhouEmbattled Chinese property developer Country Garden is selling properties in Guangzhou, aiming to raise 3.8 billion yuan ($530 million), according to an asset transaction platform. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 03:41:16 GMT JVKXK552AJLRHHJY2QFELIKDBA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/country-garden-seeks-sell-assets-worth-530-mln-guangzhou-2024-01-24/Reuters世界中国
Exclusive: China regulators ask funds to curb short selling of stock index futuresChina's securities regulators have asked some hedge fund managers to restrict short selling in its stock index futures market, two sources said, as authorities seek to stabilise sinking stocks. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 03:24:51 GMT RW75RAAMF5M2FJ3VSXDZMBMVGQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-regulators-ask-funds-restrict-short- sell-stock-index-futures-sources-2024-01-24/Reuters可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
China adds 12.44 mln urban jobs in 2023，says more effort needed this yearChina created 12.44 million new urban jobs last year, meeting its target, but more efforts are needed to prop up employment amid uncertain economic conditions in 2024, the country's human resources ministry told a press conference on Wednesday. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 03:23:46 GMT NQJU33CZJRPZZFWCH2VI4W6MVE https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-adds-1244-mln-urban-jobs-2023says-more-effort-needed-this-year-2024-01-24/Reuters市场宏观问题
Japan exports soar to record in Dec; China shipments make long-awaited reboundJapan's exports surged to record highs in December, with shipments to the U.S. soaring to their strongest-ever level while those to China were also robust, logging their first rise in more than a year. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 03:20:37 GMT MHSROWON3VLADNZB34HVXBBX3Y https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/japan-exports-soar-record-dec-china-shipments-make-long-awaited-rebound-2024-01-24/Satoshi Sugiyama市场宏观问题
Asian stocks gain as potential China rescue package lifts moodAsian shares rose on Wednesday on optimism that Chinese authorities will offer support for its stock markets, which have plummeted to multi-year lows, while a hawkish tilt from the Bank of Japan lifted the yen. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 03:00:49 GMT NXO7V25JVRIQHKEZKALKXFX2IE https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-01-24/Ankur Banerjee市场
Dollar hovers near 6-week high on Fed view; yen edges up after BOJThe dollar hovered near a six-week high against major peers on Wednesday as investors cemented expectations that the Federal Reserve would be in no rush to cut interest rates in the face of a resilient U.S. economy. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 01:32:33 GMT 5LARM4LK4JMEXO3L4NT6YKUQAA https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/dollar-hovers-near-6-week-high-fed-view-yen-edges-up-after-boj-2024-01-24/Kevin Buckland市场货币
Philippine says armed forces to ensure 'unimpeded and peaceful' exploration in South China SeaThe Philippines armed forces will guarantee the "unimpeded and peaceful" exploration and exploitation of natural resources within the country's exclusive economic zone (EEZ) as it shifts its focus to external defence, Manila's defense secretary said. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 01:27:14 GMT XGYJZZI7S5IURNZZJGO5XILVAQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippine-says-armed-forces-ensure-unimpeded-peaceful-exploration-south-china-2024-01-24/Reuters世界亚太地区
China says EU's 'unfair' EV subsidies probe risks damaging ties- Bloomberg NewsChina's ambassador to the European Union called the EU's probe into Chinese electric vehicle manufacturers over state subsidies "unfair", Fu Cong told Bloomberg News in an interview. Wed, 24 Jan 2024 01:15:00 GMT PH4CUUVT2ZPWZBPTNMSD3TZBVM https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/china-says-eus-unfair-ev-subsidies-probe-risks-damaging-ties-bloomberg-news-2024-01-24/Reuters商业汽车与交通
